subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Radio
lead_paragraph: Dan Dierdorf, 64, who played offensive tackle for Michigan under Bo Schembechler, announced his return to broadcasting with a three-year contract as the radio analyst for Wolverines football.
snippet: Dan Dierdorf, 64, who played offensive tackle for Michigan under Bo Schembechler, announced his return to broadcasting with a three-year contract as the radio analyst for Wolverines football.
